Nubel

This special restaurant is located just next to Reina Sofia Museum. It has more than 800m2 and it has a modern, cozy design.

It opens from 9a.m to 2a.m, serving breakfast, brunches, lunches, dinners and DJ and club at night

They offer high quality cuisine, modern and always with a very nice presentation

Location: Princesa Sofia Museum

Dining room capacities: 700 pax (coktail)

Price Level: average-high

Style: International mixed cuisine

Vegetarian Options/Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
